com.siperian.sam

Interface PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PasswordHashAuthenticationUtilsImpl

    public interface PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils
    Provides utilities for authentication clients and providers which support authentication by user and password hash contract.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils.UserAndHash
      Represents user and hash for authentication by user and password hash contract.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getHash(String password)
      Returns hash by password.
      byte[] getPayload(PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils.UserAndHash userAndHash)
      Returns payload for UserProfile.setPayload(Object).
      PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils.UserAndHash getUserAndHash(byte[] payload)
      Translates payload to user and hash object.

    • Method Detail

      • getHash

        byte[] getHash(String password)
        Returns hash by password.
        Parameters:
        password - password.
        Returns:
        hash.

      • getPayload

        byte[] getPayload(PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils.UserAndHash userAndHash)
        Returns payload for UserProfile.setPayload(Object).
        Parameters:
        userAndHash - user and hash object.
        Returns:
        payload.

      • getUserAndHash

        PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils.UserAndHash getUserAndHash(byte[] payload)
        Translates payload to user and hash object.
        Parameters:
        payload - payload.
        Returns:
        user and hash object or null, if payload has not supported format.
        See Also:
        getPayload(UserAndHash)
